title: ISic000394. I.Sicily inscription 000394
body:
Facsimile Images

Avitianus ((·)) fide-
lis hic in pace Χρί(στι)
quiescit qui vixit
an(nis) XII requievit
5d(ie) XVI K(a)l(endas) Aprili(es)
cons(ulatu) Theodosi XV
et Fl(avi) Valentiniani IIII

Apparatus criticus

Text after CIL; Muratore: TIDE
line.2: Le Blant: XRI
line.3: Muratore: QVIECIT
line.4: Le Blant: X...
line.5: Muratore: KI
line.7: Muratore: III; Le Blant: .II

English translation

Faithful Avitianus rests here in the peace of Christ, who lived 12 years, and found rest 16 days before the Kalends of April, under the 15th consulship of Theodosius and the 4th of Fl(avius) Valentinianus

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7113 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Mommsen 1883 992 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Le Blant 1856 xxxvii n.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001398
  • 1357 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000357
